long description: Unlimited On Net local/STD mobile calls -- 50 MB 2G/3G/4G data (4G handset users will get additional 250 MB 2G/3G/4G data) -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- Customers newly upgrading to 4G Handset will be eligible to get additional data only after 48 hours of handset upgrade. Additional data can be used on 4G handset only -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
Free Local calls with FUP -- 50 MB 2G/3G/4G data (4G handset users will get additional 974 2G/3G/4G data^) -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity

Free Local/STD calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- 1 GB 2G/3G/4G data (4G handset users will get 1GB/Day 2G/3G/4G data, Customers newly upgrading to 4G Handset will be eligible to get additional data only after 48 hours of handset upgrade. Additional data can be used on 4G handset only) -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
